title: AUT Tier List
description: Explore the latest AUT tier list for December 2024, categorizing Stands from S to C Tier with detailed descriptions to help you choose the best abilities in A Universal Time.
heading: AUT Tier List
introText: Explore the latest AUT tier list for December 2024, categorizing Stands from S to C Tier with detailed descriptions to help you choose the best abilities in A Universal Time.

data.itemDescription: An enhanced version of Star Platinum with superior strength and time-stopping capabilities
A Stand known for its unparalleled power and rarity
Combines the abilities of The World with Requiem, offering immense power and time manipulation
Possesses the ability to heal and repair objects, along with formidable combat skills
Capable of extracting and manipulating discs, allowing control over others' abilities
A powerful entity with a range of attacks and high damage potential
The final evolution of Tusk, offering enhanced speed and destructive capabilities
Grants the ability to revert actions and nullify attacks, providing a strategic advantage
Allows manipulation of the environment, creating strategic opportunities in battles
Known for its ability to steal abilities or items from opponents, adding versatility to combat
A mid-evolution of Tusk with moderate combat abilities and range
Provides utility with its ability to gather information and perform ranged attacks
Features abilities that can confuse opponents, offering strategic advantages
Possesses time manipulation skills, though less potent compared to higher-tier Stands
Offers increased speed and agility, suitable for hit-and-run tactics
Early evolutions of Tusk with limited abilities and combat effectiveness
Grants basic vampiric abilities but lacks the strength of higher-tier Stands
Provides energy-based attacks but is generally outclassed by more powerful abilities
Offers rotational energy attacks with limited application in battles
Features defensive capabilities but lacks offensive strength, making it less viable in combat
